name: The Music Box
description:
A fps horror hexagon voxel game. Mystry lies ahead but all that is know is that you must find the music box.

Rate here: http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-29/?action=preview&uid=27122

Controls:

Shift : sprint

E : Interact

WASD : move

Mouse : aim

The file is big so you might be better off downloading it for a better experience and more reliable frame rate.
